siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Each US state has different schedules and policies for vaccine distribution, so it can be hard to figure out when and where to get vaccinated. We built this simple, free tool so educators can easily monitor their eligibility and subscribe for updates.
blogPost.body: Each US state has different schedules and policies for vaccine distribution, so it can be hard to figure out when and where to get vaccinated. We built this simple, free tool so educators can easily monitor their eligibility and subscribe for updates.
blogPost.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker for Teachers - A state-by-state educator guide to vaccine eligibility.
blogPost.author: Tessa Mu

localize.description: 美国每个州都有不同的疫苗分发时间表和政策，因此很难弄清何时何地接种疫苗。我们建立了这个简单、免费的工具，使教育工作者可以轻松地监测他们的资格和订阅更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者对疫苗资格的指南。

localize.description: 美國每個州都有不同的疫苗分發時間表和政策，因此很難弄清何時何地接種疫苗。我們建立了這個簡單、免費的工具，使教育工作者可以輕鬆地監測他們的資格和訂閱更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者對疫苗資格的指南。

previous.excerpt: Not very popular on Twitter? Prefer Android to iPhone? At Scrubhouse, we've got you covered! Come join the conversation with the rest of us.
previous.title: Scrubhouse - Drop-in audio chat for the rest of us

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受欢迎？更喜欢Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我们已经为你准备好了! 快来加入我们的对话。
localize.tagline: 我们其余人的即时语音聊天

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受歡迎？更喜歡Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我們已經爲你準備好了! 快來加入我們的對話。
localize.tagline: 我們其餘人的即時語音聊天

next.excerpt: OneBar is a shared Q&A knowledge base for your team. With our new Chrome Extension, you can access OneBar answers in any web app you use. Improve your sales responses in Gmail, speed up case resolution in Intercom, or even optimize prospecting on LinkedIn.
next.title: OneBar for Chrome - Q&A knowledge base built into every app you use

localize.description: OneBar是您团队的共享问答知识库。通过我们新的Chrome扩展，您可以在您使用的任何网络应用中访问OneBar答案。改进您在Gmail中的销售响应，加快Intercom中的案例解决，甚至优化LinkedIn上的潜在客户。
localize.tagline: 您使用的每个应用程序都内置了问答知识库

localize.description: OneBar是您團隊的共享問答知識庫。通過我們新的Chrome擴展，您可以在您使用的任何網絡應用中訪問OneBar答案。改進您在Gmail中的銷售響應，加快Intercom中的案例解決，甚至優化LinkedIn上的潛在客戶。
localize.tagline: 您使用的每個應用程序都內置了問答知識庫
